item.title: [DSPK]Cursers Draining[DSPK]
item.dc:creator: @C_Imbued C++ Imbued
item.description:
@C_Imbued wrote:

DSPK, Prayers drain really fast so i’m going to show how to fix and yes i know it’s very very very very very very very very easy lol.

Combatassistant.java Find:

replace that whole method with
double[] curseData = { 0.6, // Protect Item 2, // Sap Warrior 2, // Sap Range 2, // Sap Mage 2, // Sap Spirit 1, // Berserker 2, // Deflect Summoning 2, // Deflect Mage 2, // Deflect Range 2, // Deflect Melee 2, // Leech Attack 2, // Leech Range 2, // Leech Mage 2, // Leech Defence 2, // Leech Strength 2, // Leech Energy 2, // Leech Special 2, // Wrath 4, // Soul Split 5, // Turmoil };

The numbers before it example;

“2”, // soulsplit

Are the timers you can change them 2 what ever you like, i have changed mine to a suitable amount

@Whoever flames gtfo i don’t want use here it’s for whoever needs this and wanted it.

Read full topic
